p: Reagents such as acetonitrile and chloroform from we have purchased Merck (Darmstadt, Germany), while methanol, formic acid, hydrochloric acid, acetone, sodium carbonate, nitric acid from POCh (Katowice, Poland). Standards of 3,5-di-caffeoylquinic acid (3,5-diCQA), 3,5-dimethoxy-4-hydroxycinnamic acid (sinapinic acid), p-coumaric acid, ferulic acid, isorhamnetin, quercetin, rutin, catechin, and Folin-Ciocialteu reagent were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
